div.p:
Curia capitalis huius burgi tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem septimo die mensis
Januarij anno Domini et cetera lxxmo quo die secte vocate et curia affirmata absentes pa
tent inferius in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Johannes modan capellanus procurator et procuratorio nomine altaris sancti cristofori scituati in
ecclesia parochiali beati nicholaij burgi de Aberdene' accessit ad barram et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo Redditu viginti solidorum debitis annuatim dicto altari de dimidia australi parte terre
anterioris Jacente in capitali vico vici castri et de orientali parte terre interioris eiusdem vici inter
terram Johannis mathouson' ex parte boriali terre anterioris et terram heredum quondam Willelmi pulty
ex parte australi eiusdem terre et terram Johannis adamson' ex parte occidentali terre interioris ex parte
vna et communionem venellam qua itur ad montem castri ex parte orientali ex parte altera et accedens ad
dictas terras cum testibus subscriptis nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu in dictis
terris preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia in sacculo coram balliuis tanquam primo die
huius processus testibus thoma Jamyson' et Duncano de lundoris et Duncano de straloch' seriando

Eodem die Alexander club capellanus procurator et procuratorio nomine altaris sancti crucis wlgariter
nuncupati le browne crois scituati in ecclesia parochiali beati nicholaij huius burgi accessit ad
barram et protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu viginti solidorum dicto altari debit' annuatim de /

Eodem die comparuit coram preposito et balliuis pro tribunali sedentibus gilbertus de Kintor et
calumpnatus fuit per gilbertum moryson' de iniusta detencione ab eodem de vna barella sal
monum vel xlvj s' sibi debitis et dictus gilbertus concessit se finisse plegium pro barella sal
monum quare balliui onerauerunt aim eum ad satisfaciendum dicto gilberto moryson' vel xlvj s'
dictam barellam salmonum vel xlvj s' infra quindecim dies proximes et immediate sequentes

Eodem die Robertus de culan accessit ad barram et protestabatur pro vno annuo Redditu decem
solidorum sibi debit' annuatim de illa terra cum pertinenciis Jacente in vico inferiori ecclesie inter
terram Johannes Webstar' ex parte occidentali et communionem venellam regiam ex parte orientali ad quam
accedens cum testibus subscriptis nichill reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et la
pides quos presentauit in curia coram balliuis in sacculo tanquam primo die huius processus testibus
Jacobo craike Duncano de lundoris et Duncano de straloch seriando

The samyn day thome of Drummys of the newburgh' strekit a borch' in philp of Drumbrekis
hande ane of the seriandis of this burgh apon' sandy fraser that he aw to fre him the croftis
that he has payit the male till him of fra all vthiris and wrangwisly that he dois it nocht
the saide sandy fraser askit at the bailyeis a lachfull day til ansuer' to the saide borche
the quhilkis thai grauntyt him that day xv dayis gif it was lachfull day or than the
next lachfull day til ansuer' to the saide borche

Johannes Wormot super quem gilbertus moryson' porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione
de triginta solidis sibi debitis ex puro mutuo sepe vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit
tanquam tercio die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando quod capiat districtum de e eo ad valorem
et cetera testibus Johanne de hill alexandro fraser

Johannes fechat iunior super quem Robertus prat porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione
ab eodem de vna barella le perwardone' cum qua intromisit et vendidit in le fyrth' sepe
vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus ideo precipitur
seriando quod capiat districtum de eo et cetera testibus Johanne Waus' et Dauid farchar'

Eodem die dominus Alexander club capellanus et procurator altaris sancte crucis wlgariter nuccupati le browne'
croys' scituati in ecclesia beati nicholaij burgi de Aberdene' accessit ad barram et protestabatur pro vno
annuo Redditu viginti solidorum vsualis monete scocie debitis annuatim de dimidia australi parte terre
anterioris Jacentis in capitali vico vici castri inter terram Johannis mathouson' ex parte boriali et terram
heredum quondam Willelmi pulty ex parte australi et de orientali parte terre interioris prefate terre Jacentis in
eodem vico inter terram Johannis Adamson' ex parte occidentali et communionem venellam regiam ex parte orientali
qua itur ad montem castri ad quas accedens nichill reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu
preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia in sacculo coram balliuis tanquam primo die huius processus
testibus thoma Jamyson' Duncano de lundoris et Duncano de stralouch' seriando /

Eodem die Adam andirson' adiudicatur in tribus amerciamentis curie pro absencia sua a tribus placitis precedentibus et in
vno amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione a gilberto de Kintor de octo libris grossorum monete flandrie
sibi debitis pro quartario vnius nauis ab eodem empto et ad satisfaciendum dictam summam prefato gilberto
infra terminum Juris et eciam vnam barellam salmonum debitam per suam obligacionem

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus ductis per priorem et conuentum domus fratrum predicatorum burgi de
Aberdene' de recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre cum pertinenciis Jacentis in vico inferiori
ecclesie ex boriali parte eiusdem inter terram alexandri lesly ex parte occidentali et terram andree cumyn scissoris
ex parte orientali In defectu solucionis vnius annui redditus sex'sex' overwrites something else. solidorum et octo denariorum sibi debit'
et a longis temporibus non solutis et peciit a balliuis secundum formam processus Juris et iusticie comple
mentum vnde horam diei legittime exspectata curia bene auisata decretum fuit per curiam et datum pro iudicio
per os Willelmi serreff Judicatoris curie quod dictus prior et conuentus recuperauerunt possessionem et proprietatem
dicte terre cum pertinenciis ob defectum solucionis annui redditus prenotati testibus curia /

This is the condicione and appoyntment made betuix Johne' Wormot burges of abirdene
on that a part and Willam browne of elgine and Wat aulde of fores on that vthir' part that
is to say that the saide Johne' Wormot has vndirtane to pass' in the Realme of Inglande
for the racowerance and persewing of the gudis of elgine and of fores haldine be Inglismen
in The toune' of scarburgh' on his awin expens' and gif it sall happin the saide Johne' to
racowir' and optene' ony of the saide gudis out of the Inglismennis handis he sall haue
the thridpart of tha gudis for his labour' and his costis and expensis to be tane of the hale gudis
and the saide merchandis sal haue the twapartis of the gudis that ar' recoueryt and the saide Johne'
makande lele and trew count of the his ressattis to the saide merchandis be the fath' of his
body befor thir witnes Alexander blindsele and thomas of chawmer twa of the bailyeis
of abirdene Richarde of Kintor Willam of Rattre and Johne' Dawson' with' vthir sindry

Curia balliuorum tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xiiijto die mensis Januarij Anno
Domini et cetera lxxmo

Eodem die nicholayus baxtar in amerciamento curie per propriam confessionem pro sua inobediencia
ad gustandum seruiciam cum suis sociis

Joneta hucstar' in amerciamento curie per confessionam propriam pro iniusta fractione communis statuti in
vendendo laganas et cetera

Marioria betty in amerciamento curie per propriam confessionem pro iniusta perturbacione sine fractione
communis statuti in vendicione laganarum et cetera

Marioria pery in amerciamento curie per propriam confessionem pro iniusta fractione communis statuti
pro vendicione laganarum

John Wricht has tane to prufe with lachfull pruf the morne' befor the bailyeis
that the hors' that he saulde to gilbert of Kyntor was worth' xl s' the tym that
he saulde him

Eodem die Johannes fechat iunior comparuit in Judicio coram balliuis pro tribunali
sedentibus fecit constituit et ordinauit gilbertum Waus' suum procuratorem in omnibus suis
actionibus placitis querelis motis seu monendis contra ipsum per quoscumque et cetera
et promisit de Rato cum ceteris clausulis procurator' necessarijs et oportunis

Curia legalis huius burgi tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xxjo die mensis
Januarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxmo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent
inferius in Rotulo sectarum /

Quo die Johannes fechat iunior adiudicatur in duobus amerciamentis curie pro sua absencia
a duabus curiis legalibus precedentibus ad respondendum plegio porrecto super eodem per Robertum
prat Juniorem pro iniusta detencione ab eo de vna barella le per wardone et cetera

Alexander goldsmitht super quem alexander traile porrexit plegium in manibus
Duncani de straloch' vnius seriandorum huius burgi pro iniusta perturbacione detencione
ab eodem de vna barella salmonum pro qua deuenit sibi debitor' plegio pro Johanne
makyson' de banff sepe vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit tanquam primo die
huius processus testibus Willelmo giffarde et Johanne chapman

Eodem die dictus Johannes fechat adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione de
quinque solidis ab eodem quos cepit pro centum piris venditis in le leith' et ad sa
tisfaciendum eidem infra terminum Juris et si dictus Johannes potest legittime probare
infra xlta dies proximas sequentes quod non fuerunt de barella pirarum vlterius valen'
ad vendendum nec ad commodum ipsius erit quitus pro dictis quinque solidis soluendis sin
autem dictus Johannes satisfaciet dicto roberto prat pro quolibet centum quinque solidos
infra terminum Juris

Eodem die thomas quhite dedit gilbertum Waus' plegium legalem pro se quod gilbertus
de Kintor erit indempnis de se aliter quam per viam Juris
gilbertus de Kintor dedit

The assise has deliueryt and ordanit that Adriane sal finde sickir' souerte
to gilbert of Kintor to content and pay til him in the erast schipe that
sailys out of this burgh' or til his factouris the xj s' g' vj g' quhilk
he grauntis he ressauit of his sarplar' of lamme woll' that was in his
schip that brak Item the assise has ordane the saide Adriane to bring gud
certyficacione within yer' and day quhar' he saulde sa mekle' lame woll
as drew the xj s' g' vj g' and that he hade na mar' na gat na mar' pro
fyt of that sarplar' of lame woll' and be quyt and failyeande of that certyfi
cacione that he bring it nocht within yer' and day the saide adriane sal
content and pay to the saide gilbert the hale sarplar' of lame woll' within
lachfull tyme borch' for the xj s' g' vj g' gilbert the Waus' and Johne'
the Waus'

Andreas ayncroft fecit constituit ordinauit quia Willelmum vokat thomam de fyfe angusium Johneson' Willelmum
giffarde et dominum Johannem forstar' capellanum cum potestate substituendo vnum vel plures loco
ipsorum suos procuratores coniunctim et diuisim ad relaxandum et redimendum quoddam singulum
deauratum de manibus margarete crine pro xlta solidis sibi per me impignerat' et ceteris in hac
parte peragendis que ordo Juris exigit et requirit et promisit de Rato cum ceteris clausulis
procuratorie necessariis et oportunis

xxiiijto die mensis Januarij anno Domini et cetera lxxmo plegium porrectum per Johannem Wormot prelocutorem
margarete crine super Willelmo giffarde pro iniusta detencione ab eadem de vna cingulo deaurato sibi
inpignerato pro xx s' et dictus Willelmus pecijt diem legalem a balliuis ad respondendum dicto plegio
et balliui assignauerunt sibi diem lune aduenientem octo dies ad respondendum dicto plegio et
ad comparendum ad dictum diem dedit manum propriam in plegium

Curia balliuorum huius burgi tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvj die mensis Januarij
anno Domini et cetera lxxmo

Eodem die cristinus litstar' et Johannes de torryleth' sponsus Isabelle galt /
submiserunt se ex vtraque parte Johanni de scrogis Johanni mathouson' gilberto
leche edmundo banerman et Willelmo clerke de quyltis in omnibus causis et querelis
inter ipsos decidendis die lune ad octo dies per eosdem sine vlteriori dilacione et
dicti cristinus et Johannes sunt fide media obligati ad standum eorum decreto et
determinacionj in omnibus premissis

Robertus prat dedit gilbertum de Kintor plegium legalem pro se et parte sua tota
quod ricardus stewin et pars eius tota erunt indempnes de se aliter quam per viam Juris
eciam dictus ricardus stewin dedit dictum gilbertum de Kintor plegium legalem quod Idem
robertus prat et pars eius tota erunt indempnes de se aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia balliuorum huius burgi tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die mensis Januarij
anno Domini et cetera lxxmo /

Eodem die alanus smytht per confessionem propriam in amerciamento curie pro iniusta spoliacione
de le bredd' de sancto loye a Willelmo lorymar' et restaurabit eandem dicto Willelmo
in continente

The samyn day comperit in Jugement befor the bailyeis Johne' the Waus' seriande and Dauy
the Waus' his son' and grauntyt that thai war' awande a hamburgh of salmunde til gilbert
moryson' the quhilkis thai oblist to pay him be Witsonday next eftir folowande the date
of this write but ony langar delay And gif thai failye in the payment of the saide hamburgh
barell' of salmunde at the dayis forsaide the saide gilbert sal hafe thair' half nettis fisching
of the furdis of the next yer' for the saide hamburgh barell of salmunde and for the maile of the
watir payande to the bailyeis but ony interrupcione of thaim and ar' oblist be the fathis of
thair' bodijs to warand' the saide watir to the saide gilbert

Eodem die Johannes de marr' Junior adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
Walteri smitht et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt et Johannes de marr' dedit Johannem
de marr' auunculum suum plegium legalem quod Walterus smitht et Willelmus smitht erunt indempnes
de se aliter quam per viam Juris

Willelmus smitht frater dicti Walteri et eciam Walterus smitht quilibet eorum adiudicatur
in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis de marr' et emendabit parti lese prout Jura
volunt / et dictus Walterus et Willelmus dederunt alanum smitht plegium legalem quod Johannes
de marr' erit indempnis de se aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia legalis huius burgi tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis
februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxmo

Eodem die alexander goldsmitht super quem alexander traile porrexit plegium
pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de vna barella salmonum pro qua deuenit
fideiussorem pro Johanne makyson' de bamff sepe vocatus ad respondendum dicto
plegio non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera
testibus Johanne hill et patricio sticlaw /

Eodem die Andreas Kowtis protestabatur quod sii non poterit inuenire cartas
suas de terris suis cum pertinenciis Jacentibus in vico viridj et cetera inter hinc et hodie
ad quindenam quod non sibi preiudicaret penes Jus suum de dictis terris

Eodem die Willelmus giffarde super quem Johannes Wormot procurator et procuratorio
nomine mergarete cryne porrexit plegium in manibus philippi de Drumbrek
vnius seriandorum dicti burgi pro iniusta detencione ab ea de vno singulo argenteo
quod sibi inpignerauit pro xx s' sepe vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio non comparuit
tanquam primo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera testibus tota curia

The samyn day it is deliuerit be ane sworne' that in the actione movit betuix
William vokat and William andirson' anent a hamburgh' of salmunde and a certan
of hidis that gif the saide Willam vokat can schaw ane act in the common
buke that the saide caus' is endit befor' with' a sworne' assis' sa ferr'
as that act proportis the saide William andirson' sal fulfill and gif thar' be
nane act' in the buke tharof the saide William andirson' sal acquyt him
that he hade content the saide Willam vokat of that gudis and be quyt

Patricius besat scissor adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniustai perturbacione alexandri sanchar' et quod fuit
principalis actor discordie et emendabit eidem prout Jura volunt

Eciam dictus alexander sanchar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti patricij et emendabit
eidem prout Jura volunt /

the samyn day it is appoyntit and fullely accordit betuix Robert burnat
on that a parti and Jamys hervy on that vthir' part anent the annuale acht to
the quhite freris of robert burnatis wiffis lande on this wys' that is to say
that the saide Robert sal pay the freris al the annualis bigan to Witsonday and
at day the saide Jamys sal pay vij s' to the freris and frathine furth'
the saide Robert and Jamys sal pay the saide annuale betuix thaim he the ta half
and he the tothir and ilkan of thaim to fre vthir' and the saide Robert sal deliuer to adam
hervy and his wyf dayly caile quhen he has thaim in his yarde that may gudely
sustene thaim

Curia balliuorum huius burgi tenta in pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis februarij
anno Domini et cetera lxxmo

Quo die alexander fraser in amerciamento curie per propriam confessionem pro iniusta perturbacione
Johannis Wode et emendabit ei prout Jura volunt /

Johannes Wode in amerciamento curie per propriam confessionem pro iniusta perturbacione in verbis
vxoris alexandri fraser et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt /

Thomas broysur' dedit Ricardum hill' plegium legalem pro se quod alexander fraser
et pars eius tota erunt indempnes de se et parte sua tota aliter quam per viam Juris

Alexander fraser dedit thomam simson' plegium legalem pro se quod thomas broysur'
et pars eius tota erunt indempnes de se et parte sua tota aliter quam per viam Juris

Alexander feny super quem Dauid de stratone' porrexit plegium in manibus philippi
de Drumbrek vnius seriandorum huius burgi pro iniusta detencione ab eo de xj s' vj
d' pro quibus deuenit sibi plegium pro rogero beninge dictus alexander pecijt diem
legalem a balliuis ad respondendum dicto plegio ballivi assignauerunt sibi diem
lune adueniente octo dies ad comparendum et ad respondendum dicto plegio tanquam primo
die huius processus

The samyn day comperit in Jugement Willam of setone' complenyeande apon' William
of cadyow that wrangwisly and agaynnis the law he come apon' with ege' and
vir' / and strublit hym and brek apon' him law borowis and apon' forthoucht felny
and askit of him law / the saide bailyeis accusit the saide William of the saide actionis and
he ansuerit and allegit that the saide caus' dependit in the law befor' a hier' Juge
and to schaw that he askit a lauchful day the saide bailyeis wele avisit assignit to
hym that day xl dayis to bring gud certificacione that the saide caus' dependis in the law on
decidit it may suffice and gif he bringis nane at the saide day he sal entir befor' the
bailyeis the samyn day and ansuer' to the saide Willam of setone' as law will' for
the quhilkis to be done' he has fundin alexander meignes borch' to the fulfilling
of al thingis forsaide

Sexto die mensis februarij anno Domini quo supra alexander sanchar' adiudicatur in amerciamento
curie pro iniusta perturbacione patricij besat et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Consimili modo patricius besat adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione alexandri sanchar'
et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Septimo die mensis februarij anno Domini quo supra Ricardus stewin dedit gilbertum lech
plegium legalem pro se quod copin symundeson' et pueri sui erunt indempnes de se et
parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Gilbertus leche dedit Andream rede de badfothale plegium legalem pro se et parte sua
tota quod copin symiundson' et pueri sui aliter quam per viam Juris

Patricius besat scissor dedit Johannem Wormot plegium legalem pro se et parte sua tota
quod alexander sanchar' et pars eius tota aliter quam per viam Juris

Alexander sanchar' dedit Duncanum sanchar' plegium legalem pro se et parte sua tota
quod patricius besat et pars eius tota aliter quam per viam Juris

Adriane Ingbrichtson' has tane to prufe lachfully within yer' and day her'eftir that he
has deliueryt to gerarde owirdale portar' of brugis the thre hamburgh barellis of sal
munde of Johne' mathouson' quhilkis he hade in his schip And gif the saide edrian
failyeis of his prufe within yer' and day as saide he sal content and pay to the saide
Johne' mathouson' for ilke hamburgh barell' of salmunde xxj s' g' iij g' togiddir with
al costis and scathis that the saide Johne' mathouson' has sustenyt in the meyne tyme
within terme of law ffor the quhilk some' of iij li' g' iij s' g' and ix g' the saide edrian
has fundin gilbert the Waus' and Johne' the Waus' borch' is coniunctly and seueraly gif
it swa hapnys to content and pay the saide Johne' mathouson' or his deputis within
terme of law scriptum septimo die mensis februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxmo

vndecimo die mensis februarij anno Domini quo supra thomas andirson' dedit
robertum blindsele plegium legalem pro se quod alexander fraser erit indempnis de se
aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die alexander fraser dedit Willelmum blindsele plegium legalem pro se
quod thomas andirson' erit indempnis de se aliter quam per viam Juris

The samyn day comperit in Jugement befor' the aldirman and the bailyeis syttand' in Jugement
ser Johne' of chawmer and conuenit gilbert of chawmer of twa merkis of annuale acht til him of Kymdijs
lande of termys bigan the saide gilbert denyit that he acht the saide twa merkis and tharuppon' thar' was
chosin ane assise of worthy men sworne' tharto / the quhilk assise the avamentis of bath the parteis forsaide
herde and vndirstandin wele and riply avysit deliueryt and fande that the saide ser Johne' hade tane certan
pundis of the saide lande befor' the saide gilbertis entre quhilkis war' nocht lachfully Journayt and that he
sulde bring tha pundis agayn in sic lik ply and ger' Journay thaim lachfully and gif thai war' nocht
worth' the annuale to rayse that want of the lande and the saide gilbert quyt on the meyne tym
of his clame /

Eodem die mariota sponsa thome andirson' de futy accusata fuit per balliuos
ad instanciam alexandri fraser pro Iniuriosis verbis sibi impositis facta fuit quita de dictis
verbis per bonam assisam Juratam /

Curia legalis huius burgi tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xviijo die
mensis februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxmo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata
absentes patent in rotulo sectarum /

Eodem die Willelmus giffarde secundo die sepe vocatus ad sectam margarete crine vt supra
non comparuit et ideo precipitur seriando quod capiat districtum de eo / et cetera

Alexander goldsmitht sepe vocatus ad sectam alexandri traile pro iniusta detencione
ab eodem de vna barella salmonum mensure hamburgensis et cetera non comparuit tanquam
tercio die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

The xxv day of feueryer' the yer' of god et cetera lxx comperit Duncane tailyour' befor'
the bailyeis in Jugement and has grauntyt him awande to Johne' Wormot aucht
hamburgh barell' of salmunde full rede and swete and to pay him thaim at lammes next to
cum and gif he failyeis in the payment or deliuerance of the saide viij hamburgh barellis of salmunde
to the saide Johne'

add.foreign: Wormot solut' quit' per confessionem dicti Johanni Wormot

div.p:
The samyn day comperit Johne' Wormot befor' the bailyeis sittande in Jugement and
clamyt Duncane tailyour' of viij hamburgh barellis of salmunde that he was awande
him the saide Duncane has opinly grauntyt him awande til the saide Johne' Wor
mot viij hamburgh barrelis of salmunde to be payit til him at lammes next to cum quhar'for
the bailyeis chargit the seriande til lay wande on the saide Duncane and to charge
him that he pass' nocht out of tolbuthe til he finde sickir' souerte to content
and pay the saide viij hamburgh barrelis of salmunde at the forsaide terme of lammes to the saide
Johne' Wormot but ony langar delay

The samyn day the saide Duncane tailyour' has fundin gilbert of Kintor borch' and
dettour' to sandris blindsele ane of the bailyeis for the forsaide viij hamburgh barrelis of salmunde
to be payit to Johne' Wormot at lammes next to cum and for to kepe the saide gilbert
scathlace of the saide salmunde the saide Duncane has resignit his hale lande with
the pertinens thar he duellis in the saide bailye his handis to deliuer state and possessione'
to the saide gilbert tharof gif he hapnis to failye in the payment of the said' viij hamburgh barrelis
of salmunde in al or in ony part of thaim as saide and the saide lande with the pertinens

The samyn day thome broysour' is in amercyament of the court for the wrangwis'
borche strekin apon' elyne broysour' his sistir of the wrangwis' withhalding
of a curche /

Alexander fraser spekar' for elyne broysour' his wyf in amercyament for the wrangwis' with
haldin of ane orison' buke be the saide elyne fra him and to deliuer him the saide buke
within lachfull tym
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem nono die mensis marcij anno Domini et cetera lxxmo

Eodem die Willelmus vrry adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis
patrikson' et patricij andirson' et emendabit eisdem prout Jura volunt per visum proborum
hominum et dedit Willelmum de abberdour' plegium legalem pro se quod Johannes patrikson'
et patricius andirson et omnes eisdem adherentes erunt indempnes de se et parte sua tota
aliter quam per viam Juris

E dicti Johannes patrikson' et patricius andirson' quilibet eorum adiudicatur in
amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione prefati Willelmi vrry et emendabunt sibi prout Jura
volunt per visum proborum hominum et prefatus Johannes patrikson' dedit Willelmum blinde
sele pro se quod dictus Willelmus vrry et pars eius tota erunt indempnes de se et parte
sua tota aliter quam per viam Juris Eciam dictus patricius andirson' dedit eodem modo
dedit andream de culan plegium legalem pro se quod dictus Willelmus et pars eius tota
erunt indempnes de se et de parte sua tota aliter quam per viam Juris

The xviij day of the monethe of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxx it is deliuerit be inquisicione
of a sworne' assise of worthy men at the comawndement of and charge of oure souerane lorde
the kingis lettres that sandy of marr' the son' of Johne' of marr' of the castale gat has the letter of
Reuersione' of William bertlotsonis' lande quhilkis gilbert of Kyntor made til him of the samyn lande that our'
souerane lorde lettres chargyt and commawndit til inquer' quhat persone hade the saide letter of reuersione

The xxix day of marche the yer' et cetera lxxj comperit Dauid mathouson' befor' the bailyeis
syttande in Jugement and menyt him to thaim that he was duellande in a lande of vm
quhile Johne' lechis lyande in the gallowgat vtuthe the port apon' the west syde of that ilke
of the quhilk lande I hafe a condicione of the air' that gif he analys or sell' the saide lande that
he sal sell' it to me befor' ony vthir' and of bettar price And tharfor he made supplicacione to
the saide bailyeis that in cas' that he walde sell it til ony vthir' and raquer' yow to gif
saysing that ye walde gif nane on to the tym that I haf my condicionis knawin of his
promys' the quhilkis the saide bailyeis ane as all and all as ane grauntyt to the saide Dauid
to keipe vndone' /
